titleStmt.title: Religio laici, or, A laymans faith a poem.
titleStmt.author: Dryden, John, 1631-1700.

notesStmt.note: Attributed to John Dryden. Cf. NUC pre-1956.
Commendatory poems by Thomas Creech, and an anonymous author. Cf. Macdonald, H. John Dryden. p. 35.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
